com.github.dandelion.core.util.scanner

Class ClasspathResourceScanner

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.github.dandelion.core.util.scanner.ClasspathResourceScanner

  • public final class ClasspathResourceScanner
extends Object

    Scans for resources within the classpath.

    Since:
    0.10.0
    Author:
    Thibault Duchateau

    • Method Detail

      • findResourcePath

        public static String findResourcePath(String location,
                      String nameFilter)

        Finds the logical path of the first resource that matches the given resourceName by scanning the classpath under the given location.

        By default, no other condition but the name will be applied to the resource name.

        Parameters:
        location - The classpath location where to scan.
        nameFilter - The name of the resource to look for.
        Returns:
        The logical path of the resource if found, otherwise null

      • findResourcePaths

        public static Set<String> findResourcePaths(String location,
                            Set<String> excludedPaths,
                            String nameFilter)

        Finds the virtual path of all resources that match the given conditions by scanning the classpath under the given location.

        Parameters:
        location - The classpath location where to scan.
        excludedPaths - List of paths which will be excluded during the classpath scanning.
        nameFilter - The name of the resource to look for.
        Returns:
        A set of resource paths that match the given conditions.

      • findResourcePaths

        public static Set<String> findResourcePaths(String location,
                            Set<String> excludedPaths,
                            String prefixFilter,
                            String suffixFilter)

        Finds the virtual path of all resources that match the given conditions by scanning the classpath under the given location.

        Parameters:
        location - The classpath location where to scan.
        excludedPaths - List of paths which will be excluded during the classpath scanning.
        prefixFilter - The prefix condition to be applied on the resource name.
        suffixFilter - The suffix condition to be applied on the resource name.
        Returns:
        A set of resource paths that match the given conditions.
